version_description:
Hello! This is a small update that includes the following fixes:
- UI and UX improvements
- Fixed an issue where in-app purchases wouldn't be restored
- There's now an error message if there's a problem exporting your story, but let's hope you never see it:)

Like it, love it? Leave feedback and a rating to let us know! If you have any suggestions, contact us through hello@unfoldstori.es or reach to us through social media.

Happy storytelling!

P.S. If you love Unfold: Stories, we'd be thankful if you rated us!

Hi! Thank you to everyone who has been tagging @unfold on their stories! We absolutely love seeing them. We also love hearing feedback - it really helps us shape our updates. In this one you will find the following fixes and features:
- Improved video quality (yay!)
- Ability to access your camera when uploading a picture or video
- Fixed an issue where the export icon would appear on the exported page
- Minor UX improvements

If you have any suggestions, contact us through hello@unfoldstori.es or reach to us through social media.

Happy storytelling!

P.S. If you love Unfold, we'd be thankful if you rated us! :)

Update to the latest version for access to our newest templates, fonts, and other tools. In this update, you’ll find the following:

- When opening Unfold after updating, we’ll perform some maintenance to optimize your photos and videos for a smoother experience.
- New scale media gestures! Now it's easier to move and scale your photos and videos. Try the new double tap gesture to fit to frame!
- Unfold now exports at a higher quality on smaller devices.
- Fixed a bug where a thin green line would appear on exported videos.

We love hearing your ideas and feedback. If you have any suggestions, email us at hello@unfoldstori.es or send us a message on Instagram.

If you love Unfold, don’t forget to leave a review :)
